book.synopsis: Through adventures involving a haunted marsh, talking trees, and the creature called the ballymag, the young wizard Merlin continues to experience both his growing powers and his essential humanity, in the fourth installment of the Lost Years of Merlin epic. Reissue.
book.title_long: The Mirror of Merlin (DIGEST) (Lost Years Of Merlin)
book.dimensions: Height: 7.75 Inches, Length: 5.5 Inches, Weight: 0.3 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
